text: Q: What is Walert? A: Walert is a conversational AI system developed at RMIT University to explore knowledge-base powered dialogue. Q: What is RAG? A: RAG stands for Retrieval-Augmented Generation. It retrieves relevant documents and augments the answer with context. Q: Who developed Walert? A: It was developed by the Intelligent Retrieval group at RMIT University. Q: How does RAG work? A: RAG first searches a knowledge base for relevant information and then passes both the user query and retrieved info to the language model to generate an answer. Q: Can I add my own data? A: Yes. You can add .csv, .txt, or .md files into the data/faq/ folder, and the system will rebuild the index from your content.
